titles.aside: Welcome to the future of hedge funds management

messages.confirm: Your email address has been confirmed!
messages.reset: Your password has been changed. Use new password to enter your account
messages.email send: Activation email has been sent to Email address
messages.many emails: You are sending too many verification emails. Please check your spam folder or

labels.dont ask: Don't ask again on this computer

text.sent code: A letter with a confirmation code has been sent to the address

text.restore: Enter your email address to restore account

password.secure: Your password is secure and you're all set!
password.full:
Your password needs to be
One lowercase character
One uppercase character
One number
One special character
8 characters minimum
password.right: Sorry, that password isn't right. We can help you recover your password.

email.valid: Please enter a valid email address
email.at: An email address must contain a single @
email.domain: The domain portion of the email address is invalid (the portion after the @:)
email.find: Sorry, we couldn't find an account with that email. Can we help you recover your email?

name.numbers: Full name will not contain numbers

phone.letters: Phone number will not contain letters
phone.count: Phone number must contain 12 characters and be numbers only
phone.correct: Please enter a correct phone number

exchangeApi.api-key-added: We are in the process of updating your trading history, it will be available within 5 minutes
